title: ECHS Notification 2026 - Apply Offline for 172 Clerk, Medical Officer and Other Posts
description: The Ex-Servicemen Contributory Health Scheme (ECHS) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 172 Medical Officers, Dental Officers, Pharmacists, Lab Technicians, Nursing Assistants, Peons, and Chowkidars. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MBBS, BDS, B. Pharm, D. Pharm, 12th, 08th, DMLT, B.Sc Nursing, Any Degree, MD/MS can apply for the ECHS Noti...
